box.label1: Drag & drop or click to select a PDF document from your device.
box.label2: Your documents won't be uploaded or saved.

notFound.message: Your document could not be verified. This is not proof that it has been forged. The file might have been altered unintentionally or there could be a technical problem. Try again in a few minutes or contact the issuer.

revoked.status: This file has been revoked and is no longer valid.
revoked.message: This document was originally registered by the issuer below and has since been revoked. It may or may not have been replaced by a newer version. Please contact the issuer for further information.

selfDeclared.status: File was registered but the issuer is not verified by certifaction
selfDeclared.message: Caution: this issuer identity has not been verified by certifaction. It is a self-declared identity. If you are not sure about this file's authenticity, please contact the issuer.

verified.status: This file was certified by a trusted issuer.
